title: Extension of the term of Office of the National Delimitation Committee for the Demarcation of Wards under the Local Authorities Elections Ordinance (Chapter 262) for a further period of two months
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. A.L.M. Athaulla, Minister of Local Government and Provincial Councils, to extend the term of office of the above Committee for a further period of three months with effect from 2013?12?07 for the completion of the work entrusted to the Committee, was approved by the Cabinet.
